title: Snowdown 2016 music download please
body:
Yo Rito,

Can you please provide a 320kbps version of the 2016 showdown theme please. A SoundCloud upload will be fine. 

Thanks
V

replies.body: I think OP meant the login screen theme. This sounds like the map's ambient music â€” which is still great, don't get me wrong! But I've been waiting for the login screen to go up on the Soundcloud as well. I normally download things from there way after the relevant event happens, so I don't know how long I should expect to wait. Glad to see other people are curious too.
Oh! Sure, I can get that, too! :) [Try dis!](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B7ncFYHSRBboZXpXdm1IdG13ZFE)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=L4qAxnOQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-10T23:22:14.617+0000)
>
> Hey! Does [this work](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B7ncFYHSRBboZXpXdm1IdG13ZFE?usp=sharing) for you?

You bloody genius mate! THANK YOU! I completely forgot to check this.
/thumbs-up!

As a side, for the "Snowdown 2016 Login Screen Theme.mp3" would you happen to have a .wav or 320kbps version?
!
!
!
!
!
Hey! I'm going to tag in @RiotZimberfly on this, since he's a sound designer and has access to wayyy more than I do. :)

hey, Zimberfly may have accidentally deleted the files from the drive. I only see one file now. 
Cheers,
V
